author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons, including a woman, were killed in two different road accidents in Nagercoil.

An unidentified woman was crushed to death by a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus near the Collectorate here on Thursday night.

In the second incident, an identified youth who fell down from his motorcycle, bearing Kerala registration number, in his effort to avoid falling into a pit dug for underground drainage work near Anna bus stand was run over by a lorry.

The bodies were sent to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.

Nagercoil Traffic Investigation Wing police have registered cases.
title: Two killed in road accidents
